TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BitmapSource extends System.Windows.Media.ImageSource
Public MustInherit Class BitmapSource Inherits ImageSource
public ref class BitmapSource abstract : System::Windows::Media::ImageSource
type BitmapSource = class inherit ImageSource interface DUCE.IResource

Docs.summary: Represents a single, constant set of pixels at a certain size and resolution.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> 是的基本构建基块[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]从概念上讲表示具有特定大小和分辨率的像素的单个常量集的图像处理管道。 一个<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>可能是提供了一个解码器，图像文件中的单个帧，也可以是对转换的结果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>自己。 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource> 不用于表示多帧图像或动画。
[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 以本机方式支持的压缩和解压缩[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_bmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bmp-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gif](~/includes/tlasharptla-gif-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpegorg](~/includes/tlasharptla-jpegorg-md.md)]， [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]，和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)]映像。
对于解码方案中，位图<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>使用自动编码解码器发现，基于用户的系统上已安装的编解码器。
最大高度和宽度的图像为 2 ^16 像素 32 位 / 通道 * 4 个通道。 最大大小<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>为 2 ^32 字节 （64 千兆字节为单位） 和最大图像大小是四个图形芯片核心填充。 最小的图像大小为 1 x 1。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>并将其用作源的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>控件。
[!code-csharp[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapSourceCreate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/CSharp/BitmapSourceExample.cs#bitmapsourcecreate)] [!code-vb[imagingsnippetgallery_procedural_snip#BitmapSourceCreate](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImagingSnippetGallery_procedural_snip/VB/BitmapSourceExample.vb#bitmapsourcecreate)]
下面的代码示例使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>派生的类， <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>，若要从图像文件创建位图，然后将其用作源的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>控件。
[!code-csharp[imageelementexample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/CSharp/SimpleImageExample.xaml.cs#simplecsharp1)] [!code-vb[imageelementexample#SimpleCSharp1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ImageElementExample/VB/SimpleImageExample.xaml.vb#simplecsharp1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void CheckIfSiteOfOrigin() cil managed

Docs.summary: Checks whether the bitmap source content is from a known site of origin. This method is used to make sure that pixel copying operations are safe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果它传递此方法才会成功<xref:System.Uri>这是从源站点，或者，定义`pack:`。 在所有其他情况下，此方法将失败。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values. When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本使用的强类型实现。
有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void CloneCore(class System.Windows.Freezable sourceFreezable) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub CloneCore (sourceFreezable As Freezable)
abstract member CloneCore : System.Windows.Freezable -> unit override this.CloneCore : System.Windows.Freezable -> unit

Docs.summary: Makes this instance a deep copy of the specified . When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用时调用基实现重写此方法。 若要创建当前对象的可修改副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。
有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property will be even if the source's property was .

remarks.format:

有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValueCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DecodeFailed As EventHandler(Of ExceptionEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Occurs when the image fails to load, due to a corrupt image header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是.NET Framework 3.5 版中引入的。 有关详细信息，请参见[版本和依赖关系](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。 ## XAML 文本使用情况 \<*object* DecodeFailed="*EventHandler*" .../>

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadCompleted As EventHandler

Docs.summary: Occurs when the bitmap content has been completely downloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于所有类型的位图内容可能不会引发此事件。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadFailed As EventHandler(Of ExceptionEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Occurs when the bitmap content failed to download.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于所有类型的位图内容可能不会引发此事件。 ## XAML 文本使用情况 \<*对象*DownloadFailed ="*EventHandler*".../ >

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Custom Event DownloadProgress As EventHandler(Of DownloadProgressEventArgs)

Docs.summary: Occurs when the download progress of the bitmap content has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于所有类型的位图内容可能不会引发此事件。 ## XAML 文本使用情况 \<*object* DownloadProgress="*EventHandler*" .../>

Docs.param: if this instance should actually freeze itself when this method is called; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Makes an instance of or a derived class immutable.
Docs.returns: If is , this method returns if this can be made unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable. If is , this method returns if the if this is now unmodifiable, or if it cannot be made unmodifiable, with the side effect of having begun to change the frozen status of this object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void GetAsFrozenCore(class System.Windows.Freezable sourceFreezable) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub GetAsFrozenCore (sourceFreezable As Freezable)
abstract member GetAsFrozenCore : System.Windows.Freezable -> unit override this.GetAsFrozenCore : System.Windows.Freezable -> unit

Docs.param: The object to clone and freeze.
Docs.summary: Makes this instance a clone of the specified object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。 请注意，如果这些属性包含资源引用或数据绑定<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>失败时尝试冻结该对象，将引发<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。
调用此方法<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>方法应不直接从代码中，除非调用在调用时重写此方法的基实现。 若要创建当前对象的冻结的副本，请调用<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozen%2A>而不是直接调用此方法。
有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.GetAsFrozenCore%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

remarks.format:
